thumb.name: From Our Family Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holidays%3Cbr%3E2006%3Cbr%3EFrom the%3Cbr%3EWallings Family%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay the special joy%3Cbr%3Ethat fills our hearts and home%3Cbr%3Ebe with you%3Cbr%3Eat the holidays and always.

thumb.name: Right Time
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ELeslie. Remembering You Across the Miles There's no time as right as these days in December For thinking of family our hearts love to remember.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's only in miles we're apart--in thought. we're close at this special time and always. Wishing You the Season's Best and a Wonderful New Year%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Holiday Wish Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E[Blank]%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWarm and wonderful.%3Cbr%3EBright and beautiful-%3Cbr%3Ehope that's how your holidays are!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holidays from the Smiths.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Holiday Silliness
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGIVE ME%3Cbr%3EBACK MY ARMS!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHAPPY HOLIDAYS%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Season's Greetings Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holidays.%3Cbr%3EMartha...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;The lamps are lit. %3Cbr%3Ethe fires burn bright. %3Cbr%3EThe house is full%3Cbr%3Eof love and light.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGreetings of the season%3Cbr%3Ewith a wish for nothing less%3Cbr%3EThan all that fills your holidays%3Cbr%3Ewith joy and happiness.
